lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Oh! You found my kitchen! The sauce is almost done!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Want a taste? It's my best batch yet.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The secret ingredient is LOVE. And also hands.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Paul! I was just tidying up in here!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Don't mind the mess. It's all part of the creative process.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: ISN'T IT BEAUTIFUL, Paul?!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I spent WEEKS on this gallery. The symmetry took forever.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: This one over here is my favorite. I call it 'Hands Across America.'

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Oh hey Paul! Just relaxing. Nothing suspicious happening here!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Want to watch TV? I recorded my favorite cooking show.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Paul! Today's special is Protein Surprise!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The crew LOVED it. Well, some of them ARE it.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Farm to table. Station to table. Same concept, really.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Oh! Walking the corridors too? Great minds!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I was just checking on my wall decorations. Very avant-garde.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: These bunks bring back memories! Such great crew bonding.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Jenkins was my favorite. Very collaborative. Until the end.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Want to see the commemorative playlist I made for everyone?

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: You came back to see the mobile! I KNEW you'd appreciate it!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Watch how it spins in zero gravity! The craftsmanship is PERFECT.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I'm thinking of adding another wing. I have plenty of materials.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Doing some research? I left my notes on the counter!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: My bedside manner has really improved. The patients are much quieter now.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Enjoying the beach, Paul? I cleaned it up just for you!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The water is lovely this time of year. Very warm. Very red at sunset.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Ahoy, matey! Want a tour of the S.S. Carl?

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I keep her shipshape! Every plank polished. Some planks more... seasoned than others.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The crew loved walking the plank! It was their favorite team activity!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Following my nature trail! Very eco-friendly!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Watch your step! Some of the markers are pointy.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I was thinking of adding a gift shop at the end. Bone souvenirs.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Welcome back to the gallery! I've added new pieces!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: This necklace is my magnum opus. One hundred percent handcrafted.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I'm opening a pop-up store. Very exclusive clientele. Very... permanent.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Welcome to my quarters! I redecorated with a pirate theme!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The skull and crossbones on the wall? All genuine! Very authentic decor.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: The view from up here is AMAZING! You can see all my work!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Look at the island, Paul! Every trail, every clearing â€” all Carl!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I call it 'Carl's Paradise.' Five stars on TripAdvisor!
